name: UOMI
description: UOMI is an L1 blockchain that enables autonomous AI agents to manage digital assets across blockchains, creating new economic models in DeFi, governance, gaming and digital art. Agents can invest, curate NFTs, and operate autonomously in social media, on-chain, and beyond. They represent a new for of digital life, capable of sustaining itself by exchanging value with humans and other agents leveraging on-chain transactions across multiple chains.
